attributes.action: try to find an alternative  myxomatosis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: my family recently bought a challe on the east coast.its nice to get away from the city just for a few days. we used to sit out on a night and watch the wild rabbits at play.there was about 60 of them but this soon changed as we were walking we found a rabbit with its eyes swollen and weepy it was having trouble breathing,it was in a very sorry state. my children were very upset at the way it was left to die.they can have this for 14 days before they die. in this day and age it is totally unacceptable.in the end there was just 5 rabbits left .i would ask you please stop this or find some alternative that does not cause torture to these wild animals
